# The dom extension

This extension provides support for operations on XML and HTML through Document
Object Model (DOM).

## Configuration options

### PHP_EXT_DOM

* Default: `ON`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enables the extension.

### PHP_EXT_DOM_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Builds extension as shared.
